subject: Order confirmation
description_text:
I placed an order and got a confirmation page, but I never got a
confirmation email and it doesn’t say I have any orders

conversations.body_text:
Thank you, just wanted to make sure I didn’t do something wrong!

On Wed, Nov 5, 2025 at 8:58 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Tyler Vincetich,    We have resent your order confirmation email. Have you received it?

Yes I did, thank you!

On Wed, Nov 5, 2025 at 9:27 PM service@simsonn.com
